sentences.sContent: I will not burden you with a lot of questions.
sentences.sContent_eng: I will not burden you with a lot of questions.
sentences.sCn: 我不会提许多问题来烦扰你的。

sentences.sContent: If the Workers' Party comes in at the next election a lot of industry will be stateowned.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the Workers' Party comes in at the next election a lot of industry will be stateowned.
sentences.sCn: 如果工党能在下次大选登台执政的话，许多工业将变为国有企业。
